---
name: Security vulnerability
about: DO NOT use this template for security issues. See instructions below.
labels: ''
---

**Do not report security vulnerabilities here.**

Please use GitHub's private [Security Advisory](../../security/advisories/new) feature instead. This ensures the vulnerability is handled confidentially before a public disclosure.

Include:
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce
- Potential impact
- Suggested fix (optional)

We aim to respond within 72 hours.
